name: places/ChIJ0dYmERJbwokR9lGgT85hNxg
formattedAddress: 96 Greenwich St, New York, NY 10006, USA
adrFormatAddress: 96 Greenwich St, New York, NY 10006-1801, USA

originalText.text:
Last weekend, I visited The Myth for the first time, and it was an experience like no other! From the moment I stepped in, the ambiance captivated me. The interior is stunning, with a perfect blend of modern and classic lounge aesthetics. The lighting was dim yet inviting, creating a mysterious yet comfortable atmosphere.

The music was absolutely top-notch. The DJ knew exactly how to keep the energy up with a mix of current hits and timeless classics. The sound system was impressive, delivering crystal clear sound that you could feel in your bones.

What really set The Myth apart was the service. The staff was attentive and friendly, ensuring our glasses were never empty and our needs were promptly met.

One of the highlights of the night was the live performance. It was incredible, adding a unique touch to the evening. It was the perfect mix of relaxation and excitement.

originalText.text:
If you're ready to dance like nobody's watching, then this is the place to be! From the moment you step through the glittering doors, you're transported to a world of mirror balls, and great music.
But let me tell you about the night I'll never forget. It was a Saturday night, and the dance floor was packed tighter than a can of sardines. I was busting out my best moves when suddenly the DJ dropped "7 seconds" remix.
Now, picture this: I'm strutting my stuff, feeling like a queen, so confident, when I lock eyes with a fellow raver across the dance floor. We share a knowing nod, and before I know it, we're locked in a secretly fierce dance-off showdown.
We traded moves like blows in a prizefight, spinning, dipping, and twirling with all the grace of a pair of drunken flamingos. The crowd gathered around us, cheering us on like we were the only ones there.
It was great! Love at first sight! Love at first dance! A moment! If you are ready to have a great time and potentially find love go there! It worked for me!

originalText.text: Amazing club in Manhattan FIDI! I recommend it, and you'll find me there regularly ;-) . I've been to The Myth several times since its opening, and I had so much fun every time. The owners made an effort in decorating this 2 floors clubs with perfection. The sound system is really good (enough bass as well as speakers covering both floors and all along). The crowd is educated to music and is dressed to impress.

originalText.text: Had a great experience renting this club for television interviews. The crew was treated with first class and the production went perfect. The staff went above and beyond to make sure everything went well. I would definitely reach out to them for another production filming. It was a pleasure to rent this venue from The Myth,  5 stars!

originalText.text: The night club has beautiful art and interior design that immediately caught my eye. The atmosphere was electric and the vibe was great. The music was pumping and the crowd was lively and engaged. I highly recommend this night club for anyone looking for a unique and enjoyable evening out.
